trans-unit.source: The Reach API is a high-level HTTP API allowing you to manage Reach campaigns without having to use Mobile Engagement’s Web interface manually.
trans-unit.target: The Reach API is a high-level HTTP API allowing you to manage Reach campaigns without having to use Mobile Engagement’s Web interface manually.

trans-unit.source: The Reach API allows you to leverage the Web interface of Mobile Engagement’s Reach campaign manager.
trans-unit.target: The Reach API allows you to leverage the Web interface of Mobile Engagement’s Reach campaign manager.

trans-unit.source: A Reach campaign address all the users of an application globally (even if the audience can be restricted) to deliver announcements or polls.
trans-unit.target: A Reach campaign address all the users of an application globally (even if the audience can be restricted) to deliver announcements or polls.

trans-unit.source: In order to be addressable by the Reach service, applications must embed the Mobile Engagement SDK and the Mobile Engagement Reach SDK.
trans-unit.target: In order to be addressable by the Reach service, applications must embed the Mobile Engagement SDK and the Mobile Engagement Reach SDK.

trans-unit.source: The documentation of the Mobile Engagement SDK provides all the information required to integrate Reach on the application side.
trans-unit.target: The documentation of the Mobile Engagement SDK provides all the information required to integrate Reach on the application side.

trans-unit.source: Before using the Reach Service API, it’s important to understand the life-cycle of a Reach campaign.
trans-unit.target: Before using the Reach Service API, it’s important to understand the life-cycle of a Reach campaign.

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows the important state paths of a campaign:
trans-unit.target: The following diagram shows the important state paths of a campaign:

trans-unit.source: This is the initial state of a campaign after it has been created through the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> command.
trans-unit.target: This is the initial state of a campaign after it has been created through the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> command.

trans-unit.source: The campaign can be freely <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">destroyed</link> in this state.
trans-unit.target: The campaign can be freely <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">destroyed</link> in this state.

trans-unit.source: When a campaign has been created, it can be activated using the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link> command.
trans-unit.target: When a campaign has been created, it can be activated using the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link> command.

trans-unit.source: In this case the campaign moved to the scheduled state.
trans-unit.target: In this case the campaign moved to the scheduled state.

trans-unit.source: A campaign that has been validated and that is ready to send to end-users.
trans-unit.target: A campaign that has been validated and that is ready to send to end-users.

trans-unit.source: It is still possible to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link> a scheduled campaign, if so it will go back to the draft state.
trans-unit.target: It is still possible to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link> a scheduled campaign, if so it will go back to the draft state.

trans-unit.source: A campaign that is currently being sent to end-users.
trans-unit.target: A campaign that is currently being sent to end-users.

trans-unit.source: Such a campaign is being sent to end-users.
trans-unit.target: Such a campaign is being sent to end-users.

trans-unit.source: The only way to stop the delivery of an in-progress campaign is by waiting for the campaign to expire — that is, through its end date — or by <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">finishing</link> it.
trans-unit.target: The only way to stop the delivery of an in-progress campaign is by waiting for the campaign to expire — that is, through its end date — or by <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">finishing</link> it.

trans-unit.source: When the campaign is explicitly finished, the campaign is moved to the finished state as it would have normally done when it would have expired.
trans-unit.target: When the campaign is explicitly finished, the campaign is moved to the finished state as it would have normally done when it would have expired.

trans-unit.source: A campaign that has finished its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: A campaign that has finished its life cycle.

trans-unit.source: Data have been collected and can still been seen and used but the campaign is “inactive”.
trans-unit.target: Data have been collected and can still been seen and used but the campaign is “inactive”.

trans-unit.source: A finished campaign can be <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">destroyed</link> but in this case all data collected are lost.
trans-unit.target: A finished campaign can be <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">destroyed</link> but in this case all data collected are lost.

trans-unit.source: When the HTTP method used is <codeInline>POST</codeInline>, parameters must be provided in URL-encoded form.
trans-unit.target: When the HTTP method used is <codeInline>POST</codeInline>, parameters must be provided in URL-encoded form.

trans-unit.source: Also, if not mentioned otherwise, each parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: Also, if not mentioned otherwise, each parameter is required.

trans-unit.source: In order to access the API, basic access authentication is required using Application ID:API Key as the userid:password pair.
trans-unit.target: In order to access the API, basic access authentication is required using Application ID:API Key as the userid:password pair.

trans-unit.source: This authentication scheme must be used for all URLs part of the API.
trans-unit.target: This authentication scheme must be used for all URLs part of the API.

trans-unit.source: Your application’s API Key is a sensible piece of information that you <legacyBold>must</legacyBold> keep secret.
trans-unit.target: Your application’s API Key is a sensible piece of information that you <legacyBold>must</legacyBold> keep secret.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the common status codes that can be returned by the APIs.
trans-unit.target: The following table lists the common status codes that can be returned by the APIs.

trans-unit.source: The parameters provided to the service are invalid.
trans-unit.target: The parameters provided to the service are invalid.

trans-unit.source: Application is not enabled or Reach API is disabled for this application.
trans-unit.target: Application is not enabled or Reach API is disabled for this application.

trans-unit.source: You can do the following with resources:
trans-unit.target: You can do the following with resources:

trans-unit.source: Create a Reach campaign (announcement, poll, data push or native push).
trans-unit.target: Create a Reach campaign (announcement, poll, data push or native push).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this API:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this API:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Finish</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> commands will be protected).
trans-unit.target: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Finish</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> commands will be protected).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: A text/plain entity containing only the numerical identifier of the campaign is returned.
trans-unit.target: A text/plain entity containing only the numerical identifier of the campaign is returned.

trans-unit.source: Another campaign with the same name already exists.
trans-unit.target: Another campaign with the same name already exists.

trans-unit.source: Update an existing Reach campaign (announcement, poll, data push or native push).
trans-unit.target: Update an existing Reach campaign (announcement, poll, data push or native push).

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this API:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this API:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> commands will be protected).
trans-unit.target: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> commands will be protected).

trans-unit.source: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link>.
trans-unit.target: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link>.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: Invalid access key (the key must match the one provided on create).
trans-unit.target: Invalid access key (the key must match the one provided on create).

trans-unit.source: Another campaign with the same name already exists.
trans-unit.target: Another campaign with the same name already exists.

trans-unit.source: Destroy a campaign previously created by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link>.
trans-unit.target: Destroy a campaign previously created by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link>.

trans-unit.source: The campaign must be finished or not yet activated in order to destroy it (see Campaign life-cycle for more details).
trans-unit.target: The campaign must be finished or not yet activated in order to destroy it (see Campaign life-cycle for more details).

trans-unit.source: The current state of the campaign can be retrieved using the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> command.
trans-unit.target: The current state of the campaign can be retrieved using the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> command.

trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Finish</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> commands will be protected).

trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.source: An empty body is returned if the campaign is valid.
trans-unit.target: An empty body is returned if the campaign is valid.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a 400 error code is returned with specific error messages in the body of the HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, a 400 error code is returned with specific error messages in the body of the HTTP response.

trans-unit.source: Criteria based on the real time device’s location (like real time geo-fencing) are not taken into account in the simulation.
trans-unit.target: Criteria based on the real time device’s location (like real time geo-fencing) are not taken into account in the simulation.

trans-unit.source: A text/plain entity containing only the percentage of devices matching the audience criteria (expressed in decimal).
trans-unit.target: A text/plain entity containing only the percentage of devices matching the audience criteria (expressed in decimal).

trans-unit.source: Get all the details of a campaign by knowing its id or name.
trans-unit.target: Get all the details of a campaign by knowing its id or name.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this command:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: A JSON object describing the campaign.
trans-unit.target: A JSON object describing the campaign.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the <link xlink:href="759a08eb-8310-495e-a199-90ccb778a19f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Campaign Format</link>, the following properties are also present:
trans-unit.target: In addition to the <link xlink:href="759a08eb-8310-495e-a199-90ccb778a19f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Campaign Format</link>, the following properties are also present:

trans-unit.source: The current state of the campaign (draft, scheduled, in-progress, or finished).
trans-unit.target: The current state of the campaign (draft, scheduled, in-progress, or finished).

trans-unit.source: The date at which the campaign was activated (Not present if not yet activated).
trans-unit.target: The date at which the campaign was activated (Not present if not yet activated).

trans-unit.source: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.
trans-unit.target: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

trans-unit.source: The date at which the campaign was finished (Not present if not yet finished).
trans-unit.target: The date at which the campaign was finished (Not present if not yet finished).

trans-unit.source: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.
trans-unit.target: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

trans-unit.source: No campaign was found with the specified id/name.
trans-unit.target: No campaign was found with the specified id/name.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this API:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this API:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: draft, scheduled, in-progress, and finished.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: draft, scheduled, in-progress, and finished.

trans-unit.source: Control paging of campaigns, start results at the given page, defaults to 0 (1st page of data).
trans-unit.target: Control paging of campaigns, start results at the given page, defaults to 0 (1st page of data).

trans-unit.source: Control paging of campaigns, number of campaigns to return with each call.
trans-unit.target: Control paging of campaigns, number of campaigns to return with each call.

trans-unit.source: It will return all campaigns by defaults.
trans-unit.target: It will return all campaigns by defaults.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: A JSON array containing the total number of campaigns (that you can ignore if control paging parameters are not set) and another array containing campaign’s data.
trans-unit.target: A JSON array containing the total number of campaigns (that you can ignore if control paging parameters are not set) and another array containing campaign’s data.

trans-unit.source: The array is formatted as follows:
trans-unit.target: The array is formatted as follows:

trans-unit.source: The current state of the campaign (draft, scheduled, in-progress, or finished).
trans-unit.target: The current state of the campaign (draft, scheduled, in-progress, or finished).

trans-unit.source: The date at which the campaign was activated (Not present if not yet activated).
trans-unit.target: The date at which the campaign was activated (Not present if not yet activated).

trans-unit.source: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.
trans-unit.target: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

trans-unit.source: The date at which the campaign was finished (Not present if not yet finished).
trans-unit.target: The date at which the campaign was finished (Not present if not yet finished).

trans-unit.source: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.
trans-unit.target: The date conforms to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z' as specified by the ISO 8601 standard.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating if the campaign is protected by an access key.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating if the campaign is protected by an access key.

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the following actions will require the same access key that was provided in the Create command: Activate, Suspend, Finish, Destroy and Push.
trans-unit.target: If the value is true, the following actions will require the same access key that was provided in the Create command: Activate, Suspend, Finish, Destroy and Push.

trans-unit.source: Get all the relevant campaign statistics.
trans-unit.target: Get all the relevant campaign statistics.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this API:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this API:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> (can be retrieved using <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> or <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#list" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List</link>).
trans-unit.target: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> (can be retrieved using <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> or <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#list" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List</link>).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: The object has the following properties:
trans-unit.target: The object has the following properties:

trans-unit.source: Number of times the campaign was registered to be pushed.
trans-unit.target: Number of times the campaign was registered to be pushed.

trans-unit.source: Information only available on Android, iOS, Windows Phone and Windows applications.
trans-unit.target: Information only available on Android, iOS, Windows Phone and Windows applications.

trans-unit.source: Number of C2DM/GCM pushes (available only on Android applications).
trans-unit.target: Number of C2DM/GCM pushes (available only on Android applications).

trans-unit.source: Number of ADM pushes (available only on Android applications).
trans-unit.target: Number of ADM pushes (available only on Android applications).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the campaign was received by the application (Not present in case of a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the campaign was received by the application (Not present in case of a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the campaign was dropped by the application.
trans-unit.target: Number of times the campaign was dropped by the application.

trans-unit.source: It can happen if the SDK failed to parse the campaign payload or if an error occurred while trying to notify the end-user (Not present in case of a native-push).
trans-unit.target: It can happen if the SDK failed to parse the campaign payload or if an error occurred while trying to notify the end-user (Not present in case of a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the system notification was displayed (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the system notification was displayed (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: On Android it corresponds to a status bar notification.
trans-unit.target: On Android it corresponds to a status bar notification.

trans-unit.source: This information is not available on iOS applications.
trans-unit.target: This information is not available on iOS applications.

trans-unit.source: Number of times the in-app notification was displayed (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the in-app notification was displayed (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the campaign’s content view was displayed (Not present in case of a notification-only announcement, a data-push or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the campaign’s content view was displayed (Not present in case of a notification-only announcement, a data-push or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the system notification (On Android it corresponds to a status bar notification.
trans-unit.target: Number of times the system notification (On Android it corresponds to a status bar notification.

trans-unit.source: On iOS, it is the Apple Push notification) was actioned.
trans-unit.target: On iOS, it is the Apple Push notification) was actioned.

trans-unit.source: Number of times the system notification was exited (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the system notification was exited (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the in-app notification was actioned (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the in-app notification was actioned (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the in-app notification was exited (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the in-app notification was exited (Not present in case of a data-push or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the campaign’s content view was actioned (Not present in case of a notification-only announcement or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the campaign’s content view was actioned (Not present in case of a notification-only announcement or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: Number of times the campaign’s content view was exited (Not present in case of a notification-only announcement or a native-push).
trans-unit.target: Number of times the campaign’s content view was exited (Not present in case of a notification-only announcement or a native-push).

trans-unit.source: For each question, you get the number of people who selected the corresponding choices.
trans-unit.target: For each question, you get the number of people who selected the corresponding choices.

trans-unit.source: Choice and question titles are localized using the default language specified when the campaign was created.
trans-unit.target: Choice and question titles are localized using the default language specified when the campaign was created.

trans-unit.source: No campaign was found with the specified id.
trans-unit.target: No campaign was found with the specified id.

trans-unit.source: Test an existing campaign (created with <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link>) on a set of devices.
trans-unit.target: Test an existing campaign (created with <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link>) on a set of devices.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this command to perform one to one delivery; push statistics won’t be available, please use the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> command instead.
trans-unit.target: You cannot use this command to perform one to one delivery; push statistics won’t be available, please use the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> command instead.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this command:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> (can be retrieved using <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> or <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#list" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List</link>).
trans-unit.target: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> (can be retrieved using <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> or <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#list" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List</link>).

trans-unit.source: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).
trans-unit.target: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).

trans-unit.source: The language to test expressed using ISO 639-1 code.
trans-unit.target: The language to test expressed using ISO 639-1 code.

trans-unit.source: The default language of the campaign will be used if the parameter is not provided.
trans-unit.target: The default language of the campaign will be used if the parameter is not provided.

trans-unit.source: No campaign was found with the specified id.
trans-unit.target: No campaign was found with the specified id.

trans-unit.source: Test a new campaign on a set of devices.
trans-unit.target: Test a new campaign on a set of devices.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this command to perform one to one delivery; push statistics won’t be available, please use the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> command instead.
trans-unit.target: You cannot use this command to perform one to one delivery; push statistics won’t be available, please use the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> command instead.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this command:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).
trans-unit.target: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).

trans-unit.source: The language to test expressed using ISO 639-1 code.
trans-unit.target: The language to test expressed using ISO 639-1 code.

trans-unit.source: The default language of the campaign will be used if the parameter is not provided.
trans-unit.target: The default language of the campaign will be used if the parameter is not provided.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: Push a previously-saved campaign (created with Create) to a set of devices.
trans-unit.target: Push a previously-saved campaign (created with Create) to a set of devices.

trans-unit.source: The campaign must be "in progress" and its <codeInline>pushMode</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>manual</codeInline> (see <link xlink:href="759a08eb-8310-495e-a199-90ccb778a19f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Campaign Format</link>).
trans-unit.target: The campaign must be "in progress" and its <codeInline>pushMode</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>manual</codeInline> (see <link xlink:href="759a08eb-8310-495e-a199-90ccb778a19f" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Campaign Format</link>).

trans-unit.source: Note that these conditions are compulsory to enable manual push for a campaign.
trans-unit.target: Note that these conditions are compulsory to enable manual push for a campaign.

trans-unit.source: This command is particularly useful if you want to push different contents to your users and see how they respond to it.
trans-unit.target: This command is particularly useful if you want to push different contents to your users and see how they respond to it.

trans-unit.source: Unlike normal campaigns, campaigns for which the manual mode option has been enabled can be pushed multiple times to the same device.
trans-unit.target: Unlike normal campaigns, campaigns for which the manual mode option has been enabled can be pushed multiple times to the same device.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this command:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.source: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.
trans-unit.target: Valid values are: announcement, poll, data-push, and native-push.

trans-unit.source: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> (can be retrieved using <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> or <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#list" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List</link>).
trans-unit.target: Campaign identifier as returned by a call to <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> (can be retrieved using <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#details" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Details</link> or <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#list" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">List</link>).

trans-unit.source: Alternative campaign’s content to use instead of the referenced campaign.
trans-unit.target: Alternative campaign’s content to use instead of the referenced campaign.

trans-unit.source: The JSON format is the same as the one described here.
trans-unit.target: The JSON format is the same as the one described here.

trans-unit.source: All campaign’s properties can be overridden except for the following: <codeInline>name</codeInline>, <codeInline>manualPush</codeInline>, <codeInline>audience</codeInline>, <codeInline>startTime</codeInline>, <codeInline>endTime</codeInline>, <codeInline>timezone</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: All campaign’s properties can be overridden except for the following: <codeInline>name</codeInline>, <codeInline>manualPush</codeInline>, <codeInline>audience</codeInline>, <codeInline>startTime</codeInline>, <codeInline>endTime</codeInline>, <codeInline>timezone</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The example below shows how to send alternative content.
trans-unit.target: The example below shows how to send alternative content.

trans-unit.source: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).
trans-unit.target: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).

trans-unit.source: Note that if you want to push the same campaign several times to a same device, you need to make several API calls.
trans-unit.target: Note that if you want to push the same campaign several times to a same device, you need to make several API calls.

trans-unit.source: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Finish</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and Push commands will be protected).
trans-unit.target: An optional key to protect the access to this campaign (<link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#activate" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Activate</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#suspend" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Suspend</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#finish" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Finish</link>, <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#destroy" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Destroy</link> and Push commands will be protected).

trans-unit.source: The following example shows you how to send alternative content for an announcement:
trans-unit.target: The following example shows you how to send alternative content for an announcement:

trans-unit.source: If your campaign is a poll, provided data should contain the same number of questions and choices that the one you created with the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> command.
trans-unit.target: If your campaign is a poll, provided data should contain the same number of questions and choices that the one you created with the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#create" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create</link> command.

trans-unit.source: Please note that all the push messages created using this parameter will expire after 4 weeks (<codeInline>endTime</codeInline> property of the campaign will be used if less than four weeks in the future).
trans-unit.target: Please note that all the push messages created using this parameter will expire after 4 weeks (<codeInline>endTime</codeInline> property of the campaign will be used if less than four weeks in the future).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: A JSON array containing all identifiers that have been rejected.
trans-unit.target: A JSON array containing all identifiers that have been rejected.

trans-unit.source: The push can be rejected for the following reasons:
trans-unit.target: The push can be rejected for the following reasons:

trans-unit.source: The device has not reported any sessions yet.
trans-unit.target: The device has not reported any sessions yet.

trans-unit.source: The device is over quota (if a push quota filter is applied on your campaign).
trans-unit.target: The device is over quota (if a push quota filter is applied on your campaign).

trans-unit.source: Campaign must be "in progress" and campaign’s property named <codeInline>manualPush</codeInline> must be set to <codeInline>true</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: Campaign must be "in progress" and campaign’s property named <codeInline>manualPush</codeInline> must be set to <codeInline>true</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Invalid access key (the key must match the one provided on create).
trans-unit.target: Invalid access key (the key must match the one provided on create).

trans-unit.source: No campaign was found with the specified id.
trans-unit.target: No campaign was found with the specified id.

trans-unit.source: Too many device identifiers (current limit is 1000).
trans-unit.target: Too many device identifiers (current limit is 1000).

trans-unit.source: Get all the categories used by Reach campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Get all the categories used by Reach campaigns.

trans-unit.source: A JSON array containing the categories.
trans-unit.target: A JSON array containing the categories.

trans-unit.source: The Vip command can be used to insert (POST), list (GET) or delete (DELETE) device identifiers from the VIP list.
trans-unit.target: The Vip command can be used to insert (POST), list (GET) or delete (DELETE) device identifiers from the VIP list.

trans-unit.source: Devices in the VIP list are the first devices to be pushed when a campaign is activated.
trans-unit.target: Devices in the VIP list are the first devices to be pushed when a campaign is activated.

trans-unit.source: The following parameters are specific this command:
trans-unit.target: The following parameters are specific this command:

trans-unit.source: Insert only: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).
trans-unit.target: Insert only: Device identifier or comma-separated list of device identifiers (as returned by the SDK).

trans-unit.source: Delete only: Device identifier to remove (as returned by the SDK).
trans-unit.target: Delete only: Device identifier to remove (as returned by the SDK).

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#common_headers" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers </link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to Reach.

trans-unit.source: A JSON array containing the device identifiers in the VIP list.
trans-unit.target: A JSON array containing the device identifiers in the VIP list.

trans-unit.source: One or more device identifiers could not be found (see response body for the list of unknown device ids).
trans-unit.target: One or more device identifiers could not be found (see response body for the list of unknown device ids).

trans-unit.source: Insert only: Too many device identifiers (current limit is 100).
trans-unit.target: Insert only: Too many device identifiers (current limit is 100).
